## Discussion

This property contains the minimum walking steadiness value for the classification. It contains an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] instance with a percentage value between `0.0` and `1.0`.

# maximum

**Instance Property**

The minimum walking steadiness percentage for the classification.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximum: HKQuantity { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the minimum walking steadiness value for the classification. It contains an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] instance with a percentage value between `0.0` and `1.0`.
title: maximum
